script:
1). Where are you going this afternoon?
I'm leaving the office at three.
I have a meeting with Ms. Kirk. 
Because I have a doctor's appointment.
2). Excuse me, would you mind taking our picture?
No, not at all. 
Yes, I did mind.
No, I am not minding.
3). Could we swing by my house on the way?
Sure, we've got plenty of time. 
I couldn't go to my house.
We wouldn't have time.
